snippet: The Iranian writer Mahmoud Dowlatabadi’s book “The Colonel” has just been published in the United States even though it has not yet come out in his home country, where Mr. Dowlatabadi has been regarded as a subversive for decades.
abstract: Iranian author Mahmoud Dowlatabadi has written several novels that are extremely popular in his home country, though he and his work have been regarded as subversive for decades by the government; his book The Colonel, which has just been released in the United States, was written in the early 1980s and has still not been approved for publication in Iran.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian writer Mahmoud Dowlatabadi’s book “The Colonel” has just been published in the United States even though it has not yet come out in his home country, where Mr. Dowlatabadi has been regarded as a subversive for decades.

headline.seo: ‘The Colonel,’ by the Iranian Writer Mahmoud Dowlatabadi
